titles.title: A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, with respect to the operation of vehicles on certain Wisconsin highways, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 7/16/2013--Introduced. Permits the continued operation of trucks on any segment of the U.S. Route 41 corridor in Wisconsin designated as a route on the Interstate System that could operate legally on such segment before that designation without regard to federal weight limitation requirements.
